name: Krugersdorp Game Reserve
description: A beautiful game reserve offering wildlife viewing experiences.

name: Walter Sisulu Botanical Gardens
description: Home to stunning plant life and the famous Witpoortjie Waterfall.

name: Silverstar Casino
description: A top entertainment destination featuring dining, gaming, and live shows.

name: Rhino and Lion Nature Reserve
description: A private game reserve offering up-close wildlife encounters.

name: Ngwenya Glass Village
description: A craft village with handmade glass products and art galleries.

name: The Cradle of Humankind
description: A UNESCO World Heritage site with fascinating fossils and caves.

name: Lion & Safari Park
description: A must-visit attraction with lion encounters and game drives.

name: Sterkfontein Caves
description: Famous limestone caves with important hominid fossil discoveries.
